title: The Five Stocks That Crashed The FTSE 100
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Oct 9, 2015, 07:26 BST - UK Markets open in 34 mins. The Five Stocks That Crashed The FTSE 100 By Owain Bennallack | Fool.co.uk – 25 minutes ago 6,374.82 +38.47 
After a very volatile summer, the FTSE 100 -- the UK's index of leading shares -- has managed to bounce off its lows, but it still remains down for the year. Yet it hasn't been too hard to do better than the market... provided you avoided one key catastrophic sector. 
A video or other embedded content has been hidden. Click here to view it. 
Elsewhere in the market, the Fool's experts believe sales could treble in just five years at this e-commerce stealth attack whose maverick CEO may have been underestimated by the City. For more free information on this daring buy, click here now .
